alert.note: Alert for Lycoming; Sullivan; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 18 at 1:17AM EST until February 19 at 3:30AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Pennsylvania, including the following counties, Lycoming, Sullivan and Tioga. * WHEN...Until 415 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 116 AM EST, Rain and snowmelt is occurring, and will cause minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Laporte, Morris, Blossburg, Covington, Arnot, Ralston, Ogdensburg, Trout Run, Buttonwood, Cogan Station, Barbours, Shunk, Kettle Creek Gorge, English Center, Lincoln Falls, Little Pine State Park, Muncy Valley, Waterville, Cedar Run and Cammal. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
